Case No. 6,068. HARDY et al. v. CLARK et al. [The district court decision, reported in 3 N. B. R. 385 (Quarto, 99); 3 Am. Law T. Rep. Bankr. 11; 17 Pittsb. Leg. J. 61; 2 Chi. Leg. News, 121, and 1 Am. Law T. Rep. Bankr. 151, —is included in the report of the circuit court. Case No. 1,420.]

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
